## Research Projects

 *Geospatial and Sociodemographic Inequities in Non-Communicable Diseases*<br>
**B.S. Project | 2025**
  **Topic:** Insights from the BDHS 2021-22 regarding health inequities among ever-married women in Bangladesh.
  **Supervised by:** Mr. Priom Saha (ISRT, University of Dhaka).
  **Tools:** R (Tidyverse, sf), Geospatial Mapping, Statistical Modeling.

*Students' Opinion on Party-based Student Politics*<br>
**Survey Project (DURS) | 2024**
  **Scope:** Analyzed student perspectives on political activities at the University of Dhaka.
  **Status:** Published on the Dhaka University Website.
  **Role:** Lead Researcher for survey design and data analysis.
